ModMetaData.name: Desynchronized (v1.4)
ModMetaData.author: Vectorial1024
ModMetaData.description:
Change your Colonists' minds.
A continuation of Closed Doors, this mod changes how your Colonists react to the outside world.
Mainly: What will happen when colonists lose their omniscience and become oblivious to events that transpire behind closed doors or beyond their sweet homes?
- Requires HugsLib. Place this below HugsLib. - Safe to add to existing saves - Please do not remove from existing saves - Should have no problems with other mods
